HttpRelayTransportElement HttpRelayTransportElement Class

In this Article

Edit

Represents a configuration element that specifies an HTTP transport for transmitting SOAP messages.

Syntax

Declaration

public class HttpRelayTransportElement : TransportElement, IConfigurationContextProviderInternalPublic Class HttpRelayTransportElement
    Inherits TransportElement
    Implements IConfigurationContextProviderInternal

Constructors summary

HttpRelayTransportElement()
HttpRelayTransportElement()

Initializes a new instance of the HttpRelayTransportElement class.

Properties summary

AllowCookies
AllowCookies

Gets or sets a value from the configuration file that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.
BindingElementType
BindingElementType

Gets the type of binding. (Overrides BindingElementExtensionElement.BindingElementType.)
IsDynamic
IsDynamic

Gets or sets whether the relay binding is dynamic.
KeepAliveEnabled
KeepAliveEnabled

Gets or sets a Boolean value from the configuration file that indicates whether to make a persistent connection to the internet resource.
MaxBufferSize
MaxBufferSize

Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer pool from the configuration file.
Properties
Properties

Gets a ConfigurationPropertyCollection instance that contains a collection of ConfigurationProperty objects that can be attributes or ConfigurationElement objects of this configuration element. (Overrides TransportElement.Properties.)
ProxyAddress
ProxyAddress

Gets or sets a URI in the configuration file that contains the address of the proxy to use for HTTP requests.
ProxyAuthenticationScheme
ProxyAuthenticationScheme

Gets or sets the authentication scheme used to authenticate client requests that are processed by the HTTP proxy.
RelayClientAuthenticationType
RelayClientAuthenticationType

Gets or sets the relay client authentication type stored in the configuration file.
TransferMode
TransferMode

Gets or sets a value from the configuration file that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed on a request or response.
UseDefaultWebProxy
UseDefaultWebProxy

Gets or sets a value from the configuration file that indicates whether the machine-wide proxy settings are used rather than the user-specific settings.

ApplyConfiguration(BindingElement)

CopyFrom(ServiceModelExtensionElement)

CreateDefaultBindingElement()

Creates a binding element from the settings in this configuration element.

InitializeFrom(BindingElement)

Initializes this binding configuration element with the content of the specified binding element.

    AllowCookies
    AllowCookies

    Gets or sets a value from the configuration file that indicates whether the client accepts cookies and propagates them on future requests.

    [ConfigurationProperty("allowCookies", DefaultValue = false)]
public bool AllowCookies { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("allowCookies", DefaultValue:=False)>
Public Property AllowCookies As Boolean

    Property Value

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      true if cookies are allowed; otherwise, false. The default is false.

Public Property IsDynamic As Boolean

    KeepAliveEnabled

    [ConfigurationProperty("keepAliveEnabled", DefaultValue = true)]
public bool KeepAliveEnabled { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("keepAliveEnabled", DefaultValue:=True)>
Public Property KeepAliveEnabled As Boolean

    Property Value

    • Boolean
      Boolean

    MaxBufferSize

    Gets or sets the maximum size of the buffer pool from the configuration file.

[IntegerValidator(MinValue = 1)]

<IntegerValidator(MinValue:=1)>
Public Property MaxBufferSize As Integer

    Property Value

      Int32

      Returns the maximum buffer size. The default value is 65,536.

    ProxyAddress

    Gets or sets a URI in the configuration file that contains the address of the proxy to use for HTTP requests.

    [ConfigurationProperty("proxyAddress", DefaultValue = null)]
public Uri ProxyAddress { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("proxyAddress", DefaultValue:=Nothing)>
Public Property ProxyAddress As Uri

    Property Value

    • Uri
      Uri

      Returns a Uri that contains the URI. The default is null.

  • Edit
    ProxyAuthenticationScheme
    ProxyAuthenticationScheme

    Gets or sets the authentication scheme used to authenticate client requests that are processed by the HTTP proxy.

    [ConfigurationProperty("proxyAuthenticationScheme", DefaultValue = AuthenticationSchemes.Anonymous)]
public AuthenticationSchemes ProxyAuthenticationScheme { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("proxyAuthenticationScheme", DefaultValue:=AuthenticationSchemes.Anonymous)>
Public Property ProxyAuthenticationScheme As AuthenticationSchemes

    Property Value

    • AuthenticationSchemes
      AuthenticationSchemes

      The authentication scheme used to authenticate client requests that are processed by the HTTP proxy.

  • Edit
    RelayClientAuthenticationType
    RelayClientAuthenticationType

    Gets or sets the relay client authentication type stored in the configuration file.

    [ConfigurationProperty("relayClientAuthenticationType", DefaultValue = RelayClientAuthenticationType.RelayAccessToken)]
public RelayClientAuthenticationType RelayClientAuthenticationType { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("relayClientAuthenticationType", DefaultValue:=RelayClientAuthenticationType.RelayAccessToken)>
Public Property RelayClientAuthenticationType As RelayClientAuthenticationType

    Property Value

    • RelayClientAuthenticationType
      RelayClientAuthenticationType

      Returns a RelayClientAuthenticationType.

  • Edit
    TransferMode
    TransferMode

    Gets or sets a value from the configuration file that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed on a request or response.

    [ConfigurationProperty("transferMode", DefaultValue = TransferMode.Buffered)]
public TransferMode TransferMode { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("transferMode", DefaultValue:=TransferMode.Buffered)>
Public Property TransferMode As TransferMode

    Property Value

    • TransferMode
      TransferMode

      Returns a TransferMode that specifies whether messages are buffered or streamed on a request or response. By default, the HTTP, TCP/IP, and named pipe transports use buffered message transfers.

  • Edit
    UseDefaultWebProxy
    UseDefaultWebProxy

    Gets or sets a value from the configuration file that indicates whether the machine-wide proxy settings are used rather than the user-specific settings.

    [ConfigurationProperty("useDefaultWebProxy", DefaultValue = true)]
public bool UseDefaultWebProxy { get; set; }<ConfigurationProperty("useDefaultWebProxy", DefaultValue:=True)>
Public Property UseDefaultWebProxy As Boolean

    Property Value

    • Boolean
      Boolean

      true if the System.Net default proxy settings are used; otherwise, false. The default is true.
